title: House Party - Doja Cat Expansion Pack
description: Join Doja Cat (Amala) on a wild adventure as she crashes Madison's House Party.  Figure out her true intentions for the visit, and help her achieve her goals.  Will you make a new friend, enemy, or maybe something more in the process?
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# ABOUT THIS CONTENT
<!--text-->
Keep the wild and crazy party going with House Party’s first-ever expansion pack — featuring award-winning music star Doja Cat! This DLC adds hours of fun new content and branching stories to the House Party game's Original Story centering around and fully voice-acted by Doja Cat herself, as well as brand new content for all of the other House Party characters!

<!--image-->
![House Party-kj7bl](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/cf1b9bb8408045ae8614a6266240b1fa/house-party-kj7bl.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# A famous music star, a masked viral dancer, and one awesome music video
<!--text-->
A masked dancing sensation is taking the internet by storm, and Doja Cat is determined to track down this talented individual to get them to perform in her next music video.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Explore a brand new branching storyline in your favorite 3D point-and-click comedy adventure. Navigate through an unpredictable night filled with outrageous partygoers as you help Amala (also known as the Grammy and AMA award-winning pop star Doja Cat) carry out her master plan to coax the mystery dancer out of hiding!

<!--image-->
![House Party-1dtgy](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/cf1b9bb8408045ae8614a6266240b1fa/house-party-1dtgy.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# An all-new hilarious Original Story route starring Doja Cat
<!--text-->
Pairing perfectly with House Party's original story, Doja's expansion enriches the party experience with new choices, fresh narratives, more achievements, celebrity voice acting, and all-new hilarious story-lines!

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Progress through Doja’s story to help her get an invitation to the party, discover the true identity of the mysterious online dancer, and create her next music video — for better or for worse!

<!--image-->
![House Party-3tbhc](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/cf1b9bb8408045ae8614a6266240b1fa/house-party-3tbhc.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Interact with a celebrity full of personality
<!--text-->
Eek! Games and Doja Cat have worked together to create this all new House Party story. The dialogue is voiced directly by Doja Cat herself, her outfits are hand-selected, and all reactions are approved for accuracy. If you’ve ever wanted to know what it’s like to party with Doja Cat, now’s your chance to see for yourself!

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Will you help Amala (Doja Cat) achieve her goals, or will you shrug them off and get drunk with her instead? Will you be an asset to her new music video creation, or will you sabotage it? Will you become her enemy, her friend, or perhaps... more? As always with House Party, the choice is yours!

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Help those in need
<!--text-->
A portion of the proceeds of this product will be donated to a charity of Doja Cat's choosing: ACFS (Advancing Children for Success). This charity is dedicated to the development and protection of children and their families through a focus on improving access to nutrition, health, early learning, and skill development.

<!--image-->
![House Party-1fwye](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/cf1b9bb8408045ae8614a6266240b1fa/house-party-1fwye.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Doja Cat DLC pack features:
<!--text-->
- Hours of new content; new House Party adventures await you including a brand new storyline featuring Doja Cat.

- Multiple endings and side quests featuring Doja Cat.

- Two new stunning "Amala" and "Doja Cat" NPC models added to the base House Party game.

- All new scenes and stories with hundreds of lines of new dialogues voice acted by Doja Cat herself!

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
- Doja Cat's story has been integrated into the Original Story, so you will get to see her interact with your favorite House Party characters, including the Game Grumps, who will have a special role in the new story!

- Brand new content for all other NPCs in the House Party game as they relate to Doja Cat's story.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
- Custom Story Creator compatibility. Create your own adventures with Doja Cat as the star with House Party's Custom Story Creator!


Special thanks to Bravado and Epik for helping to bring this exciting crossover together!
